程序包 org.elasticsearch.action

类 GenericAction<Request extends ActionRequest,​Response extends ActionResponse>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.elasticsearch.action.GenericAction<Request,​Response>
  • 直接已知子类:
    Action
    public abstract class GenericAction<Request extends ActionRequest,​Response extends ActionResponse>
extends java.lang.Object
    A generic action. Should strive to make it a singleton.
